news.title: Trump approves Iran attack plan but has not made final decision, reports say
news.summary: US president says "nobody knows what I'm going to do" as he weighs strike on Iran.

news.title: Huge Roman 'jigsaw' reveals 2,000-year-old wall paintings
news.summary: Thousands of fragments of plaster are pieced together to reveal frescos from a Roman London villa.

news.title: Three years left to limit warming to 1.5C, leading scientists warn
news.summary: The Earth could be doomed to breach a key climate target in as little as three years, scientists warn.

news.title: Be ready to be shocked and offended at university, students told
news.summary: Guidance has been published by the Office for Students on new free speech rules coming into force this year.

news.title: Film-maker Danny Boyle talks Covid, horror, and making 28 Years Later
news.summary: The British director of 28 Years Later speaks alongside star Jodie Comer about returning to horror.

news.title: 'Trump keeps world waiting' and 'ArmageDon'
news.summary: Speculation over whether Donald Trump will join the conflict in the Middle East dominates Thursday's papers.

news.title: How 3D-printed guns are spreading online
news.summary: The BBC contacted a seller on social media. Within an hour 'Jessy' offered to sell two different guns.

news.title: New Zealand halts Cook Islands funding over China deals
news.summary: Wellington says the Cook Islands must take concrete steps to "repair" their relationship.

news.title: Pope, Bumrah, Bashir - how England v India will be won and lost
news.summary: BBC Sport and data analysts CricViz look at the key battles that could decide the outcome of the England v India Test series.
